plays.text: Penalty to Mike Ricci 2 minutes for Tripping Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Robyn Regehr 2 minutes for Hooking Wayne Primeau
Goal scored by Scott Nichol assisted by Toni Lydman and Jordan Leopold
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by Todd Harvey
Penalty to Rob Davison 2 minutes for Crosschecking(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Dave Lowry 2 minutes for Slashing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Patrick Marleau assisted by Niko Dimitrakos and Scott Hannan
Goal scored by Jarome Iginla assisted by Andrew Ference and Roman Turek
Penalty to Bob Boughner 2 minutes for Interference Teemu Selanne
Goal scored by Alyn McCauley assisted by Mike Rathje and Vincent Damphousse
Penalty to Shean Donovan 2 minutes for Tripping Jonathan Cheechoo
Goal scored by Vincent Damphousse assisted by Alyn McCauley and Jim Fahey
Penalty to Dave Lowry 2 minutes for High Sticking Niko Dimitrakos
Penalty to Kyle McLaren 2 minutes for Hooking Jarome Iginla
Penalty to Rob Davison 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Nichol
